commit.message:
Merge develop to bring in EGL, format handler and test-suite fixes

* 3e9791ff Bump release to 3.1.5
* d06c1ac8 NUMPY Register intc and uintc as handled scalar types
* 38edb04c WIN FIX GL entry points are NULL on windows initially
* 57b77067 TESTS Run accelerate tests from base tox as well
* 60aec44b BUILD Update cython source with current release
* c26398b9 TESTS Switch to pytest.mark for skipping numpy handler when not available
* 6ec398da TESTS Switch to assertRaises
* 581d2400 TESTS Don't print glget calls, compressed image api call revert
* 8cf737de API More support for using short-string types for convenience
* 1b7c3c34 API In ctypes arrays allow for numpy style short-string type specifiers
* eb9a6b4b FIX Work around weird numpy scalar behaviour (0-dimension arrays)
* d625f8b5 TESTS reason cannot be passed as a keyword argument in pytest.skip
* f12403b5 WGL FIX Set the resstyle for getCurrentDC in the wrapper
* 143ecbc8 GITHUB #7 Use b-strings instead of as_8_bit
* 44a89fe8 GITIGNORE Ignore .pyd files for Windows develop builds
* a52215fc TESTS Fix usage of glCompressedTexImage2D in test_core
* 2f401a0d EGL Allow eglGetDeviceQueryString without display, use to display drm name
* c4cd5d0b BUILD Back out adding python3.8 to the build matrix
* 447fbfa2 BUILD Continue trying to get sdl to compile
* bdb957bc BUILD Add libsdl1.2-dev to get the sld-config utility
* dccbbb64 BUILD Revert attempts to use arm64 (pygame doesn't build) but add python 3.8
* 907ec4a2 BUILD Experiment with testing on arm64 (loosely related to GH #29)
* 637caf43 TESTS Remove flaky test in favour of more robust one below it
* 144ce858 EGL DEMO Further refactoring of os_egl setup
* a07c956c EGL DEMO Allow for null values in EGL debug table formatting
* 9f115ffe EGL Explicitly export EGLError from the EGL namespace
* c58c9c46 EGL Move code to debug, rely on EGLError for display, debug configs
* 93d6f668 EGL DEMO PPM writing and tabular format of configs in EGL debug module
* 9640630b FIX Fix latebind __bool__ definition as __nonzero__ isn't available
* 8628ce11 EGL Allow ErrorCheckers to specify GLError sub-classes, use for EGLError
* 1f1cda47 FORMAT Black formatting for os_egl demo/test script
* 0ed754bf FIX for #27 to work on machines where libOpenGL is not present
* 589d3ca5 EGL Make `eglGetPlatformDisplay` an alternate with `eglGetPlatformDisplayEXT`
* e04bee44 FIX Add on for the fix to #6 to make force_extension functions bool() work
* 2487c210 EGL DEMO Try to create script to query the egl device enumerations
* 41e6f571 EGL DEMO Explicitly delete the DISPLAY environment variable to force offline operation
* 4a40d2b6 TESTS Ignore the output of osmesa and egl tests
* 3c813868 EGL DEMO Attempt to get an offscreen (pbuffer) render wrapper working
* 8f8d3e8c FIX #27 Load libOpenGL instead of libGL for egl platform
* 4f9cb46e DOCS Add pyrender as a sample source
* d401885f FIX GH #12 Include pxd files in the source-code release
* ca2cbbed DEMO Attempt to recreate github #33 without success
* ce8c5d5e DOCS Update comment to note that we're next to the main checkout now
* f85d8ce8 DOCS Update tartley projects to github urls, provide first-line links on gh and bb
* e81584a7 DOCS Skip generation of .xhtml redirect stubs
* 5f206dab DEMO provide a running version of code in bug report in #34
* bf3fe7c0 FIX Explicitly add nonzero methods for base latebind classes
Bump release to 3.1.5

NUMPY Register intc and uintc as handled scalar types

These types are seen on a new windows setup, likely
because we picked up a more recent numpy than seen
on the linux machines.

WIN FIX GL entry points are NULL on windows initially

WGL platform leaves the entry points even for core
OpenGL functionality as null until you have a context
and the image wrapper code was assuming it could rely
on the entry point being non-null in deciding whether
to wrap the function.
Run accelerate tests from base tox as well
Update cython source with current release
Switch to pytest.mark for skipping numpy handler when not available
Switch to assertRaises

TESTS Don't print glget calls, compressed image api call revert

Apparently the call to the compressed api image that failed on
win32 was correct on linux so it's that there's a broken bit on
win32 that doesn't tigger the wrapper operation.
More support for using short-string types for convenience
In ctypes arrays allow for numpy style short-string type specifiers

FIX Work around weird numpy scalar behaviour (0-dimension arrays)

Seeing test-suite failures where a numpy scalar is getting into the
handler and it's not being treated as a one-element array, but as
a *0* element array, so everything goes to heck in a handbasket
and dogs and cats are friends, mass hysteria, you know the drill

This patch means that if you pass in a scalar we'll actually create
a new 1-element numpy array and fill that array with the scalar
rather than treating the scalar as a number-like thing that can
pass through the rest of the machinery.

I don't *see* how this changed in the numpy API, so I'm suspicious
this is some weird behaviour that either never got noticed before
or it was a side-effect of e.g. having two numpy libraries on a
machine.
TESTS FIX reason cannot be passed as a keyword argument in pytest.skip
WGL FIX Set the resstyle for getCurrentDC in the wrapper

GITHUB #7 Use b-strings instead of as_8_bit

This should have no effect whatsoever, and indeed
it doesn't seem to do anything in testing, but there's
no need to create maybe-unicode and then convert to bytes
rather than just forcing to bytes to start with.
GITIGNORE Ignore .pyd files for Windows develop builds

TESTS Fix usage of glCompressedTexImage2D in test_core

If you run the core test suite on Windows where the
extension is supported we see a failure because there
is a missing argument.

Allow glGetDeviceQueryString without display, use to display drm name

The DRM name is only available on the enumeration devices, but then
those seem to show all of the devices on the modern ubuntu, so maybe
that's all we need for now.
Back out adding python3.8 to the build matrix
Continue trying to get sdl to compile
Add libsdl1.2-dev to get the sld-config utility
Revert attempts to use arm64 (pygame doesn't build) but add python 3.8
Experiment with testing on arm64 (loosely related to GH #29)

Remove flaky test in favour of more robust one below it

The first memory test had lots of little heuristics and was
very loose, yet managed to produce false-positives all the time,
the second does a far more rigorous check with a tiny allowance
for error and seems to be more reliable.
Further refactoring of os_egl setup
Allow for null values in EGL debug table formatting
Explicitly export EGLError from the EGL namespace
Move code to debug, rely on EGLError for display, debug configs
PPM writing and tabular format of configs in EGL debug module
Fix latebind __bool__ definition as __nonzero__ isn't available
